content: ✨ **northern gleam knit hat pattern a stunning stranded colorwork beanie ✨** ready to level up your knitting game the **northern gleam hat** is a dazzling celebration of color and technique that s perfect for knitters who love bold beautiful stitches designed by marly bird this bottom-up knit hat uses the stranded colorwork technique to create a radiant design that glows like the aurora borealis whether you go subtle with tonal hues or make it pop with brights this hat is guaranteed to turn heads it s the ideal accessory for chilly days gift-giving season or just showing off your colorwork skills plus the pattern includes a full-color chart and a video tutorial to help guide you through every step with confidence pattern features ✔ stranded colorwork magic create a multicolor masterpiece using just two colors per round ✔ bottom-up construction a classic clean finish with shaping that flatters every head ✔ multiple sizes includes 4 sizes to ensure a great fit for all s m l xl ✔ full-color chart + video tutorial visual learners you re covered ✔ finish with flair optional pom pom and leather tag details for added personality instant digital download this is a knitting pattern pdf not a finished hat with the purchase you ll receive a printable ad-free version with all the written instructions charted colorwork and video link included this pattern is also free on the marlybird com website with a grow sign up skill level intermediate perfect for knitters ready to try stranded colorwork or refine their technique sizes included to fit head sizes approx 18 5 20 21 22 5 47 51 53 5 57 cm circumference yarn used knitpicks swish worsted 8 colorways used feel free to customize your palette tools needed u s 8 & 9 circular needles or size to obtain gauge stitch markers tapestry needle faux pom pom and leather tag optional this is more than just a knit hat it s a wearable work of art grab your copy of the northern gleam knit hat pattern today and start stitching your own burst of color ✨
